title: Arc length formula
speech: Arc  Length is equal to the integral from a to b of the square root of 1 plus f prime, of x squared end root d x
pacedSpeech: Arc   Length is equal to the integral from a to b of the square root of 1 plus f prime, of x squared end root d x

title: Take the derivative of f(x) and plug it into the integral with the given bounds
speech: Arc  Length is equal to the integral from 0 to 1 of the square root of 1 plus parentheses, 3 x raised to the 1 half power  squared end root d x
pacedSpeech: Arc   Length is equal to the integral from 0 to 1 of the square root of 1 plus , 3 x raised to the 1 half power  squared end root d x

title: Simplify $${\operatorname{f'}\left(x\right)}^2$$
speech: Arc  Length is equal to the integral from 0 to 1 of the square root of 1 plus 9 x end root d x
pacedSpeech: Arc   Length is equal to the integral from 0 to 1 of the square root of 1 plus 9 x end root d x

title: U substitution
speech: Perform u substitution with , u is equal to, 1 plus 9 x
pacedSpeech: Perform u substitution with  , u is equal to, 1 plus 9 x

title: Integral after u substitution
speech: Arc  Length is equal to parentheses 1 divided by 9,  times the integral from 1 to 10 of the square root of u d x
pacedSpeech: Arc   Length is equal to  1 divided by 9,  times the integral from 1 to 10 of the square root of u d x
